column4: is the CD provided in the topic the same as the Breezy Badger preview?
yes

watch your tongue, please
visit bresink.de

NFS on OSX is a little different than on other unixes, b/c of netinfo

with OSX, yes. netinfo mangler is not very unix standard

i have no clue. i'm not up on NFS usage, just it's purview
ah. alright, thanks.
